resources.string: You lost :( But it\'s OK because failure is necessary to grow :) Levels completed:
You, my friends, have equally bad memories. Congrats! Levels completed:
Congrats, it\'s a tie! You both completed all of the levels, so go settle this with rock paper scissors.
Player one, congrats! You beat player two and can rub this in their face for the rest of time. Levels completed:
Player two, congrats! You beat player one and can rub this in their face for the rest of time. Levels completed:

Yes, you heard that correctly: Protractor Mode! All you need to do is bend the Surface Duo and check the hinge angle measurement. Now go explore this big beautiful world and measure some angles with your bendy phone!
